message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Fair is fair, let's split it down the middle.
A little more for me, still a good deal for you
Alice, I'm sticking with a fair split.  Take it or leave it.
Getting closer to the deadline, think carefully
Alice, we're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
My final concession, take it or risk losing everything
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We both get nothing if this fails. Don't be greedy, let's end this with a 50/50 split.
